r.s: PHP bindings to rrd tool system
r.d: Procedural and simple OO wrapper for rrdtool - data logging and graphing system for time series data.
r.n: - config.m4 - lib searching rewritten, better support across architectures #22683 - RRDUpdater - multiple DS doesnt' work #23579 - better support for compiling under 5.2.x #22719 - small manual fixes
